channel.title: Ball mill rack for pottery wheel
channel.description:
##### [Lawrence Weathers](https://www.facebook.com/lawrence.weathers.1?fref=gs&__tn__=%2CdlC-R-R&eid=ARAYNxzmInSXcSs1tinQlxswhzKs7DK1eZvGrphOAoGQuVloiSQgSx--ta4q92ILBrt8TSm9ZuiG1bu_&hc_ref=ARRNGUVOhWRW-7AnQ0Vg2gD0Dd5S-T6zFyhlCu0O-SZD4xl_kwHdmdweedCksYe6I34&dti=1909393306003874&hc_location=group) a ajouté 2 photos à l’album [November 13, 2018](https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=oa.2270359129907288&type=3).
[Hier, à 06:14](https://www.facebook.com/groups/opensourceceramics/permalink/2270359139907287/)
Sitting on pottery wheel with glass jar. I also have a procedure for making a very good, very true porcelain ball mill jar
![image|640x480](upload://v8usEXQwFzGh4aPxcLVdkVmCimv.jpeg)
This is the ball mill rack itself. This one is welded but you could probably make one with just bolting the parts together. Have any questions just message me and I'll be glad to help.
![image|640x480](upload://oDVLcnvUKTPHkKqj1TYLykEaW0N.jpeg)

item.title: Ball mill rack for pottery wheel
item.dc:creator: jpib
item.description:
Lawrence Weathers a ajouté 2 photos à l’album November 13, 2018.

Hier, à 06:14

Sitting on pottery wheel with glass jar. I also have a procedure for making a very good, very true porcelain ball mill jar

This is the ball mill rack itself. This one is welded but you could probably make one with just bolting the parts together. Have any questions just message me and I’ll be glad to help.
